metadata.name: Anton Lubchenko - The Three Words
metadata.description: THE THREE WORDS by Anton Lubchenko sets the sentence I LOVE YOU to music and is the shortest musical triptych ever composed. Each of its three parts is 30 seconds long. THE THREE WORDS is a unique 1-of-1 phygital NFT artwork. The NFT represents ownership of the first digital audio recording of THE THREE WORDS - recorded with an ensemble of soloists of the Mariinsky Orchestra, St. Petersburg on Oct 8th, 2021. On the physical side it represents ownership of the original handwritten music sheets.
